description: Happosai tries to use the Happo-Fire Burst technique but has forgotten it. The scroll with the technique happens to be at the very same hot springs resort that Akane is currently visiting.

titles.title: Maboroshi no Happou Daikarin o Sagase
Rub-a-Dub-Dub! There`s a Pervert in the Tub
幻の八宝大華輪を探せ
